price: Encomiéndate a Dios, porque Dios es suficiente como protector.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
